title: Aram Club
body:
About two months ago I had some health issues which made me unable to play normal SR comfortably. I played 1 game Intermediate AI for first win of the day for a while. As my health recovered I on and off played Aram (easier to play than normal SR)

Now, I found myself only play Aram, I think it will be cool to have a premade 5 man aram team...

Proud owner of Club Skinz  - Ign Canc

replies.body:
I have exclusively played ARAM for years.
I'm around 7500 ARAMs played.

I don't bitch and whine if someone is having a bad game on a champ they don't play, even my best LoL friends can get away with the odd feed.

Add me if you want.
